metadata.title: CVE-2013-2041 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in ownCloud 5.0.xbefore 5.0.6 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via the (1) tag parameter toapps/bookmarks/ajax/addBookmark.php or (2) dir parameter toapps/files/ajax/newfile.php, which is passed to apps/files/js/files.js.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
